name: 12 500 gold
details: Persistence and skill in combat will allow you to explore any branch of technology without any financial costs. However, you can purchase a special in-game currency - gold, which will facilitate your progress in the research tree. Gold is a great opportunity to make the gameplay more comfortable and faster to achieve the desired goal.

name: 12 500 gold
details: Serious set for serious plans. With this amount of in-game gold, you can, for example, buy a premium account for five months or transfer 312,000 units of combat experience to free. And even buy a Tier VIII premium tank. However, there are plenty of options to spend this gold - secure yourself a strategic reserve!
